trans-unit.source: Specifies which message box button that a user clicks.
trans-unit.target: 指定使用者按一下哪一個訊息方塊按鈕。

trans-unit.source: MessageBoxResult is returned by the <xref:System.Windows.MessageBox.Show*> method.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 MessageBoxResult<xref:System.Windows.MessageBox.Show*>方法。</xref:System.Windows.MessageBox.Show*>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.MessageBox.Show%2A> returns a MessageBoxResult value that specifies which button on a message box a user clicked.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.MessageBox.Show%2A>傳回 MessageBoxResult 值，指定在使用者按下一個訊息方塊上的哪一個按鈕。</xref:System.Windows.MessageBox.Show%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.MessageBoxButton> specifies which buttons are displayed on a message box.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.MessageBoxButton>指定訊息方塊上顯示哪些按鈕。</xref:System.Windows.MessageBoxButton>

trans-unit.source: The result value that is returned from a message box depends on what buttons the message box has and how a user closes a message box: - On a message box that has an **OK** button, OK is returned if a user clicks the **OK** button, clicks the **Close** button in the title bar, or presses the **ESC** key.
trans-unit.target: 從訊息方塊會傳回的結果值取決於哪些按鈕的訊息方塊中含有與使用者關閉訊息方塊的方式:-有在訊息方塊上**確定** 按鈕，確定已傳回若使用者按一下**確定**按鈕，按一下**關閉**中的標題列或按下按鈕**ESC**索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: - On a message box that has an **OK** button and a **Cancel** button, OK is returned if a user clicks the **OK** button.
trans-unit.target: -在訊息方塊具有**確定**按鈕和**取消** 按鈕，確定已傳回若使用者按一下**確定** 按鈕。

trans-unit.source: If a user clicks the **Cancel** button or the **Close** button in the title bar, Cancel is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用者按一下**取消**按鈕或**關閉**按鈕的標題列中，會傳回 [取消]。

trans-unit.source: - On a message box that has a **Yes** button and a **No** button, the **Close** button in the title bar is disabled.
trans-unit.target: -在訊息方塊具有**是**按鈕和**否** 按鈕，**關閉**標題列中的按鈕已停用。

trans-unit.source: Consequently, Yes is returned if a user clicks the **Yes** button, and No is returned if a user clicks the **No** button.
trans-unit.target: 因此，是 會傳回使用者按下**是** 按鈕，且沒有傳回若使用者按一下**否** 按鈕。

trans-unit.source: - On a message box that has a **Yes** button, a **No** button, and a **Cancel** button, Yes is returned if the **Yes** button is clicked and No is returned if the **No** button is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 入訊息方塊具有**是** 按鈕，**否** 按鈕，和**取消**按鈕、 是 會傳回**是**按鈕 和 否會傳回**否**按鈕。

trans-unit.source: If a user clicks the **Cancel** button or the **Close** button in the title bar, Cancel is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用者按一下**取消**按鈕或**關閉**按鈕的標題列中，會傳回 [取消]。

trans-unit.source: The result value of the message box is **Cancel**.
trans-unit.target: 訊息方塊的結果值就是**取消**。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: The result value of the message box is **No**.
trans-unit.target: 訊息方塊的結果值就是**否**。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: The message box returns no result.
trans-unit.target: 訊息方塊會傳回任何結果。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: The result value of the message box is **OK**.
trans-unit.target: 訊息方塊的結果值就是**確定**。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: The result value of the message box is **Yes**.
trans-unit.target: 訊息方塊的結果值就是**是**。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。
